mainHero.title: Good Enough
mainHero.subtitle: Track your expire items
mainHero.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout. The point of using Lorem Ipsum is that it has a more-or-less normal distribution of letters, as opposed to using 'Content here, content here', making it look like readable English.

items.title: A plug n play template
items.description: Just edit the config.json file with details about your company and voila your beautiful state of the art landing page is ready to go live! Remember to also update your assets, add any images you want to show to /assets/images and link them in the config.json

items.title: Make it your own!
items.description: Play around with the theme.ts file and configure the color palette to match the branding of your company! If you're feeling wild, maybe change some tailwind css as well!

features.title: Latest & greatest
features.subtitle: All the best web technologies!
features.description: Using the latest web technology api you can run the application in your browser, in your phone or tablets.

items.name: Share your lists
items.description: Share your list with your contacts

items.name: Get Insights
items.description: Get Insights on how your money is spend.

items.name: Get Alerts
items.description: Get alerts when your items are about to expire.

items.name: Multiplatform
items.description: Support for multiple screen size and can be installed as a native application.
